title: Poser ~ DAZ3D : Road and Track Scenery [RO 100032]
description:
This is a complete scene for some great renders or stories .The set includes material presets for the 4 different seasons (spring,
 summer, autumn and winter/snow ;p) and a wet road condition, like it had just rained.
 All items can be found in the props library.
 The trees and foliage can be loaded in 4 zones, Soutwest, northwest, northeast and southeast to save memory.
 
https://pximg.xyz/images/81e4d553566f42fef9e4dcd00111b56d.jpg

Renderosity 100032 - Road and Track Scenery

Made for Poser, so for D|S, surfaces will need to ba adjusted. Material presets (.mc6) do nothing in D|S, and most use multiple image layers or internal colour manipulation that do mot load up (use LIE to make you own combinations using the provided texture maps, and play with the diffuse channel to change colours quickly). Lights load with no shadow settings, the water needs a serious makeover (shaders are great), but otherwise a nice little scene to race around, like those electric car sets that never really stayed on the track.

-----
Here is a test render I made in D|S with a few of those surfaces corrected:
Layered image on the road, diffuse to red on some trees, a shader for the water surface.
 
https://pximg.xyz/images/3eabb1ecdb3cb2f468154070cf17b8fd.jpg
